articles.author: Jack Morse
articles.title: J.K. Rowling is four cocktails in and talking trash about Bitcoin
articles.description:
J.K. Rowling has been drinking a lot and you'd better believe she has some thoughts on Bitcoin.
Noted TERF and author of The Cuckoo’s Calling, Rowling decided Friday was the perfect time to learn about the cryptocurrency Bitcoin. And so, like any celebrity wh…
